templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[username]" value="{$profile.options.username}" label="{{ phrase('xc_username_tebex') }}" explain="{{ phrase('username_explain', {'boardUrl': $xf.options.boardUrl}) }}"/>
<xf:textboxrow name="options[password]" value="{$profile.options.password}" label="{{ phrase('xc_password_tebex') }}" explain="{{ phrase('password_explain', {'boardUrl': $xf.options.boardUrl}) }}"/>
<xf:textboxrow name="options[webhook_secret]" value="{$profile.options.webhook_secret}" label="{{ phrase('webhook_secret') }}" explain="{{ phrase('webhook_secret_explain', { 'boardUrl': $xf.options.boardUrl, 'url': 'tebex_callback.php?_xfProvider=xc_tebex' }) }}"/>
